(Inset) Spring clean volunteer Dorothy McCulloch alongside organisers Jason and Meredith Akuhata-Brown (not pictured organiser Bronwyn Kay). Photos / Zita Campbell, Gisborne District Council.

Waihirere Pool, a Gisborne icon, to be demolished in domain project https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/waihirere-pool-a-gisborne-icon-to-be-demolished-in-domain-project/4OSOTQ7KMREHLDXDLPSGIW4SRE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/waihirere-pool-a-gisborne-icon-to-be-demolished-in-domain-project/4OSOTQ7KMREHLDXDLPSGIW4SRE/ Wynsley WrigleyNew Waihirere Domain plan includes improved facilities; pool removal set for months.
